title: OpenWrt VM
textContent:
OpenWrt VM 
                OpenWrtis a powerful
                    open-source firmware that can transform a wide range of networking devices into highly customizable
                    and
                    feature-rich routers, providing users with greater control and flexibility over their network
                    infrastructure.
                To create a new Proxmox VE OpenWrt VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/openwrt.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 256MiB RAM - 512MiB Storage - 1CPU ⚡
outerHTML:
OpenWrt VM

OpenWrtis a powerful open-source firmware that can transform a wide range of networking devices into highly customizable and feature-rich routers, providing users with greater control and flexibility over their network infrastructure.

To create a new Proxmox VE OpenWrt VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/openwrt.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 256MiB RAM - 512MiB Storage - 1CPU ⚡
